Clip.Title: MLK: THE ASSASSINATION TAPES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of the last days of Dr. Martin Luther King told through rare television and radio news accounts, many not seen or heard since 1968.

Clip.Title: BARACK OBAMA: GREAT EXPECTATIONS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go inside the White House and behind the scenes of Barack Obama's first term as President as he confronts major crises as well as Opposition determined to take him down.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Find out why some inquiring minds believe that the world is headed for ruin within the next century.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From St. John's heading north, the Newfoundland coastline is a maze of iconic bays and inlets - from world-famous Fogo Island, to the abandoned fishing settlements along the island's Northern peninsula.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the remote Northern Shore of Nova Scotia, to the red mud perimetre of Prince Edward Island, the warm waters of the Northumberland Strait are the setting for an incredible aerial exploration of these coastlines.

Clip.Title: SERIOUSLY AMAZING OBJECTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Lindbergh's Spirit of St. Louis, Irving Berlin's piano, and Seinfeld's puffy shirt. These are just some of the many items flown, touched, played, and worn by American icons, whose great success stories can be found at the Smithsonian. Join us as we give lucky museum goers a chance to get close to some Seriously Amazing Objects. Many of these treasures are locked deep in the vaults and are not always on public display...until now.

Clip.Title: MLK: THE ASSASSINATION TAPES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of the last days of Dr. Martin Luther King told through rare television and radio news accounts, many not seen or heard since 1968.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Algae, Quest Quiz: Algae and Synthetic Biology
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Could pond scum become the fuel of the future? Explore the amazing potential of algae and find out if could be the next generation of biofuels. Find out the tools that synthetic biologists are using to make biology easier to engineer so that new functions can be derived from living systems. What are they building?

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Tagging Pacific Predators, Your Photos and Mercury in The World's Oceans
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Thanks to a tagging program, scientists are learning that tuna in open oceans travel thousands of miles around the Pacific. And, photographer and naturalist John Albers-Mead captures sometimes-sunken treasures with his digital camera. And mercury is a hidden danger in the world's oceans. Now, experts plan to clean it up.

Clip.Title: THE INCREDIBLE BIONIC MAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The quest to build and animate an artificial being entirely from bionic parts shows the incredible strides we've made in body replacement technologies.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Harry Nigh works with the "worst of the worst," repeat sex offenders and murderers newly released from the Canadian prison system.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tina Simpson ignores dire travel warnings and ventures into rural Haiti with a mobile clinic.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.Episode: Train of The Imperial Cities - Morocco
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travels on the most beautiful train rides and make fascinating encounters at different stops along the way.

Clip.Title: CORSICA: THE PEARL OF THE MEDITERRANEAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This series takes us on a journey to discover the island's history, its culture and its proud people.

Clip.Title: MEN IN RED SUITS: THE SECRET HISTORY OF SANTA CLAUS
Clip.Episode: Men in Red Suits: The Secret History of Santa Claus
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Every year men put on red suits, stuff pillows under their belts, and transform themselves into Santa Claus. Who are they personifying? A Christian saint or a pagan deity, a toy salesman, soft-drink spokesman or that mystical being who can fulfill every child's dream?
